neighbors.name: Military Brothers Moving LLC
neighbors.claims: Military Brothers Moving LLC is a moving services company based in Sierra Vista and Huachuca City, founded in 2014 by brothers and military veterans Kevin and Bryan Hoey ([Military Brothers Moving](https://www.militarybrothersmoving.com/)). Business records list the LLC's members as Bryan P. Hoey, Kevin M. Hoey, and Jeffrey T. Hoey ([Better Business Bureau](https://www.bbb.org/us/az/yuma/profile/moving-companies/military-brothers-moving-llc-1126-1000055746)). The company actively engages in local community support, co-creating the 'Tips for Vets' fundraising initiative to benefit the Warrior Healing Center ([Tips4Vet](https://tips4vet.com/)). There is no public record of the company taking a stance on land use disputes or renewable energy development.
neighbors.influence_justification: Local business with positive community engagement through veteran charities, but no evidence of political weight regarding land use.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage owners Kevin and Bryan Hoey; acknowledge their community work with the Warrior Healing Center to build rapport.

citations.claim: founded in 2014 by brothers and military veterans Kevin and Bryan Hoey
citations.title: Military Brothers Moving - About Us

citations.claim: Business records list the LLC's members as Bryan P. Hoey, Kevin M. Hoey, and Jeffrey T. Hoey
citations.title: BBB Profile: Military Brothers Moving LLC

citations.claim: co-creating the 'Tips for Vets' fundraising initiative to benefit the Warrior Healing Center
citations.title: Tips for Vets - Our Mission

neighbors.name: Kendall Family Trust
neighbors.claims: The entity is a private family trust. Public records do not explicitly identify the specific trustees or beneficiaries associated with this parcel in Cochise County. While a 'Kendall Family Trust' appears in creditor lists for Arizona-based financial proceedings with a California address ([PacerMonitor](https://www.pacermonitor.com/public/filings/DI2M4V4A/IMH_Financial_Corporation__debke-20-11858__0068.2.pdf)), a definitive link to this property cannot be verified. Charles Kendall serves as the Cochise County Public Defender ([Cochise County](https://www.cochise.az.gov/436/Public-Defender)), but no public evidence connects him to this trust or property.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private trust with no identifiable public profile or civic activity linked to this specific parcel.

approach_recommendations.engage: Identify trustees through mailers or title search; approach as a standard private landowner.

citations.claim: Kendall Family Trust appears in creditor lists for Arizona-based financial proceedings
citations.title: IMH Financial Corporation Bankruptcy Filing

citations.claim: Charles Kendall serves as the Cochise County Public Defender
citations.title: Cochise County Public Defender Office
